name: Grim demo 2012 tape
description:
Grim is a suitable band name if there ever was one, because this is some depressing stuff. No sugar coated fairy tales here, since the six songs on this demo all deal with the bleakness of human existence. All this misery is backed by a soundtrack of straight forward hardcore, with some thrash and old school groovy death metal in the riffing. 

Check it out on http://grim1.bandcamp.com/

You can download the demo for free here:
http://www.mediafire.com/?44939ubr307544z

Tapes come in 3 colors, but only orange is left.

------------------------------------------------

To order:
Belgium: of course, pick 'Belgium'
Europe: pick 'France'
Outside Europe: Pick 'Everywhere Else'

Write an email to liveandlearnhc@gmail.com if you:

- don't have paypal
- want to order multiple things (Belgian post offices calculate shipping costs based on weight. If you want to order more than 1 item, I will calculate the actual price so you don't pay too much!)

name: Seawave - Demo
description:
Seawave is a band from Long Island, New York. Their music could be best subscribed as Shoegaze with a somewhat raw, garagepunk vibe through it. You can notice they have their roots in hardcore/punk music. Still can't imagine how they sound like? Check out their bandcamp: http://seawave.bandcamp.com/
